**Sunday June 6th 11am-3pm**
  
**Lancaster Fairground Lancaster, MA**

Whisker Walk is a fun day for families and their dogs PLUS a dog walk-a-thon fundraiser to benefit rescue groups like PAWS. Last year&#8217;s walk had one hundred different rescue groups and pet vendors- it is a huge event! The event is held on 50+ acres so pet owners and animals lovers have plenty of space to bring their own furry friends! For more information on this great event, please **[click here](http://www.whiskerwalk.org/index.html)**.

This year, PAWS will have many volunteers participating in the walk-a-thon event that will take place at 12:00. If you would like to donate to one of the people walking, please fill out the email form below and be sure to click the paypal link to make a donation. You do not need a paypal account to make a donation; you can use your credit card. Thank you for your support!

**[Click here for the Online Pledge Form](https://spreadsheets.google.com/viewform?formkey=dHdFS3UtQ24weGU1YTd6MVNNNHpBSlE6MQ)**

Please click on the icon below to make the donation for the Walk-a-Thon:
